attributes.action: Keep the platform ramps on the London Underground
attributes.additional_details: The 2012 Olympics have seen the introduction of ramps between the train and platform at a number of London Underground Stations. When the Olympics are over, these ramps should be kept, enabling mobility impaired users to have easier access to the London Underground Network. These ramps should also become standard at all accessible London Underground Stations.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor and Greater London Assembly.
